citations.title: ClinicalBERT: Modeling Clinical Notes and Predicting Hospital Readmission
Health system–scale language models are all-purpose prediction engines (NYUTron)
A large language model for electronic health records (GatorTron)

Extracting Training Data from Large Language Models (USENIX Security 2021)
A certified de-identification system for all clinical text documents
Membership Inference Attacks on Machine Learning: A Survey
Learning and Evaluating a Differentially Private Pre-trained Language Model
Clinical Text Deduplication Practices for Efficient Pretraining and Privacy
